pages.title: Wild homepage appeared
pages.body:
# Welcome to planète

You can now log-in to the [administration panel](./admin) so you can add some content

## Help !!
Please, feel free to contact our one-man-community in [github](https://github.com/sieira/planete), who knows, we could become a two-people-community soon, that is, a growth of 100%, our unexistant investors would be really proud.

pages.title: Yep, tell me about you
pages.body:
Planète

Planète is an experimental framework/CMS intended to provide a quick and dirty way to create web sites using a node.js server.
